mapper.select: SELECT p.payment_no as paymentNo, p.emp_id as empId, e.emp_name as empName, cd.common_detail_name as departmentName, pos_cd.common_detail_name as positionName, e.emp_salary as empSalary, p.allow_amt as allowAmt, p.deduc_amt as deducAmt, p.net_salary as netSalary, p.payment_date as paymentDate, p.create_at as createAt, p.create_by as createBy FROM payment p LEFT JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.emp_id LEFT JOIN common_detail cd ON e.emp_dept = cd.common_detail_code LEFT JOIN common_detail pos_cd ON e.emp_position = pos_cd.common_detail_code WHERE e.emp_status LIKE 'WRST%' AND cd.common_detail_status = 'Y' ORDER BY p.create_at DESC

SELECT p.payment_no AS paymentNo, p.payment_date AS paymentDate, p.emp_id AS empId, e.emp_name AS empName, cd.common_detail_name AS departmentName, pos_cd.common_detail_name AS positionName, e.emp_salary AS empSalary, p.allow_amt AS allowAmt, p.deduc_amt AS deducAmt, p.net_salary AS netSalary, p.create_at AS createAt, p.create_by AS createBy FROM payment p LEFT JOIN employees e ON p.emp_id = e.emp_id LEFT JOIN common_detail cd ON e.emp_dept = cd.common_detail_code LEFT JOIN common_detail pos_cd ON e.emp_position = pos_cd.common_detail_code WHERE p.emp_id = #{empId} AND e.emp_status LIKE 'WRST%' AND cd.common_detail_status = 'Y' ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC, p.payment_no DESC

SELECT e.emp_id as "EMPID", e.emp_name as "EMPNAME", cd.common_detail_name as "DEPARTMENTNAME", pos_cd.common_detail_name as "POSITIONNAME" FROM employees e LEFT JOIN common_detail cd ON e.emp_dept = cd.common_detail_code LEFT JOIN common_detail pos_cd ON e.emp_position = pos_cd.common_detail_code LEFT JOIN payment p ON e.emp_id = p.emp_id AND p.payment_date = #{paymentDate} WHERE e.emp_status LIKE 'WRST%' AND cd.common_detail_status = 'Y' AND p.payment_no IS NULL ORDER BY e.emp_id
